TopicTitle: what kerbals do outside the space buisness?

Articles.Content:
And what they did before they had that ability? Havnt all of you stopped to think about that?

(Sorry if overthinking but its really intresting question)
Drink, sports and song as they are in secret Irish agents of world domination.

They don't do anything. All Kerbals are clones of Jebadiah made under the VAB. Some have defective personalities though, which is why they all have different bravery/stupidity.

This is why they are all Kermans

They don't do anything. All Kerbals are clones of Jebadiah made under the VAB. Some have defective personalities though, which is why they all have different bravery/stupidity.

This is why they are all Kermans

what about bob and bill ? they have the special suits too....

Ever since they evolved from slime they've been working on getting to space.

Why do you think they invented rockets before planes?
oh this is a forum game is it ? hmmmm........
They play pool in the Astronaut Complex

they build pretty weak electrical generation machines

They [mainsails] have the power of merely.. small nations...

or something like that

They live underground, duh!

(and grow shrooms...)

Edited March 20, 2014 by mrrpamplemousse

they build pretty weak electrical generation machines

or something like that

Actually, three jumbo jets are sufficient to equal the power consumption of a city. A mainsail could conceivably rival the power consumption of a city-state like Singapore. Someone with better figures corroborate/debunk this.
